p.d: Beef casserole for "Jeudi Gras" in Bazas We stop-off in Bazas, in the Gironde. For over seven centuries, the Thursday before Shrove Tuesday sees the town celebrate its "boeuf gras", a breed renowned for its marbled meat. Accompanied by Dominique, a fervent defender of Gascony culture, France will be cooking a beef casserole using Bazadaise beef. Presented by: France Oberkampf.
